data.name: Die drei ??? - Geheimnis der Schattenhelden
data.detailed_description:
• German language only –
Rocky Beach will become the scene of a top-secret Hollywood action movie series plotted around a league of super heroes acting as spies. But suddenly, the main character has disappeared without a trace, along with his secret super hero suit.

When Peter‘s father – who is in charge of the special effects – receives a mysterious message he asks the Three Investigators to get involved. Indeed there are some spies doing their strange job, even in reality…

Help Jupiter, Peter, and Bob to find the actor – and to prevent the series from being canceled!

  • A new case for The Three Investigators
  • Detective adventure including many locations and characters from Rocky Beach
  • With the voices of Oliver Rohrbeck, Jens Wawrczeck, Andreas Fröhlich, and some more narrators known from The three Investigators audio plays
  • For players aged 10+

data.short_description: - German language only – Rocky Beach is the scene of a top-secret Hollywood action movie series plotted around a league of super heroes. But suddenly, the main actor has disappeared without a trace, along with his secret super hero suit. Help Jupiter, Peter, and Bob to find the actor and save the series!
